name: The Living Shadows
description:
================================================================ 
We will become the Reapers among all ================================================================ 
The Living Shadows is a Military Civilisation group. The Main goal is to refine our skills in combat together while building a large commuinity. With our combined power we will challenge other groups to raids or wars to test our skill. 
================================================================


GGWqEFM

shout.body: [EVENT] Training cancelled, Not enough members came...
